name: TVBrowserViewControllerDelegate
desc: Methods for detecting events and performing actions on the browser view.

items.name: func browserViewController(TVBrowserViewController, didCenterOn: TVViewElement)
items.desc: Tells the delegate how to respond when the specified view element completes the transition to becoming centered upon.

items.name: func browserViewController(TVBrowserViewController, willCenterOn: TVViewElement)
items.desc: Tells the delegate when the specified view element is to be centered on the page.
